node.html:
• Developed and maintained API's for Sociana(Event Management App) using Ruby on Rails
  • Integrated third-party google/facebook API's for login/logout
  • Implemented FCM push notification for Sociana

• Implemented a competency resource management using Java, JSP, Servlet for internal hiring of employees.
  • Monitoring user-behaviour for breaking companies security policies and dividing them into categories using Information Security tool Data Loss Prevention.
